report.title: Overviews - sample details
report.description: A report to display the sample information on various sample details pages.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM scratchpad_lists sl JOIN scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.scratchpad_list_id=sl.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=sle.entry_id LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#all_trait_attr_ids#) WHERE sl.id = #sample_id# and '#sample_type#' = 'scratchpad' AND sl.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Scratchpad sample id to retrieve data for.

param.name: all_trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of the taxa taxon list attribute ids that hold species traits.

column.name: duplicates
column.sql: case when count(distinct sle.entry_id)=count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) then '' else ' (' || (count(distinct sle.entry_id)-count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id))::varchar || ' duplicates)' end
